body_html:
Interesting, does look like add_check_numerics_ops is messing with restore ops. For the moment please run tf.add_check_numerics_ops() before constructing the tf.train.Saver().

Short reproduction (or at least a similar error):

import tensorflow as tf

v = tf.get_variable(shape=[], name="v")
with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
    saver = tf.train.Saver()
    checker = tf.add_check_numerics_ops()  # Works if swapped with the previous line
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/model.ckpt')
    saver.restore(sess, '/tmp/model.ckpt')
    print(sess.run([v, checker]))

body:
Interesting, does look like `add_check_numerics_ops` is messing with restore ops. For the moment please run `tf.add_check_numerics_ops()` before constructing the `tf.train.Saver()`.

Short reproduction (or at least a similar error):
```
import tensorflow as tf

v = tf.get_variable(shape=[], name="v")
with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
    saver = tf.train.Saver()
    checker = tf.add_check_numerics_ops()  # Works if swapped with the previous line
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/model.ckpt')
    saver.restore(sess, '/tmp/model.ckpt')
    print(sess.run([v, checker]))
```
